title: Mick Lynch – 2022 Comments on Strikes on the Tube and Overground
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Mick Lynch, the General Secretary of the RMT, on 18 August 2022.
content:
Tube bosses are having secret negotiations with the government about slashing jobs and undermining working conditions and pensions all in the name of removing subsidies.
